articles.author: Sian Cain
articles.title: 'It still hurts': Chris Rock speaks about Will Smith slap for first time - The Guardian
articles.description: Comedian lays into victimhood, Jada Pinkett Smith and her husband during his new standup show, saying ‘she hurt him way more than he hurt me’
articles.content:
Chris Rock has spoken at length for the first time about being slapped by Will Smith during the Oscars, almost a year since the scandal that shocked millions watching around the world.
